summary: "The Phantom of the Opera" is a popular musical by Andrew Lloyd Webber, based on a novel by Gaston Leroux. It's about a talented but ugly musician who lives under a theater and becomes obsessed with a beautiful singer named Christine. The show opened in London in 1986 and later on Broadway, winning many awards. It became the longest-running Broadway show and was seen by millions worldwide. The musical was also made into a movie in 2004. Recently, the original productions in London and New York ended, but a new version opened in London in 2021.
title: The Phantom of the Opera (1986 musical)
